member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.LongExposureInfraredFrameReader.AcquireLatestFrame
member.summary: Acquires the latest available frame.
member.remarks: A given reader will only return each frame once. If no new frames are available since the last call to this method, the result will be null.
member.returns: Returns a valid frame, or null if no new frames are available.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.LongExposureInfraredFrameReader.IsPaused

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings
member.summary: Specifies the interactions that are supported by an Kinect for Windows application.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.KinectHold
member.summary: Enable support for the press and hold gesture through Kinect gestures. The Holding event is raised if a time threshold is crossed before the user moves the hand cursor away from the UI element. This gesture can be used to display a context menu.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationTranslateInertia
member.summary: Enable support for scaling inertia after the pinch or stretch gesture (through pointer input) is complete. The ManipulationInertiaStarting event is raised if inertia is enabled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationScale
member.summary: Enable support for the zoom gesture through pointer input. These gestures can be used for optical or semantic zoom and resizing an object. The ManipulationStarted, ManipulationUpdated, and ManipulationCompleted events are all raised during the course of this interaction.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationTranslateRailsY
member.summary: Enable support for the slide gesture through pointer input, on the vertical axis using rails (guides). The ManipulationStarted, ManipulationUpdated, and ManipulationCompleted events are all raised during the course of this interaction. This gesture can be used for rearranging objects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationTranslateRailsX
member.summary: Enable support for the slide gesture through pointer input, on the horizontal axis using rails (guides). The ManipulationStarted, ManipulationUpdated, and ManipulationCompleted events are all raised during the course of this interaction. This gesture can be used for rearranging objects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationTranslateY
member.summary: Enable support for the slide gesture through pointer input, on the vertical axis. The ManipulationStarted, ManipulationUpdated, and ManipulationCompleted events are all raised during the course of this interaction. This gesture can be used for rearranging objects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.ManipulationTranslateX
member.summary: Enable support for the 1:1 panning manipulation through pointer input, on the horizontal axis. The ManipulationStarted, ManipulationUpdated, and ManipulationCompleted events are all raised during the course of this interaction. This gesture can be used for rearranging objects.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.Tap
member.summary: Enable support for the tap gesture.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings.None
member.summary: Disable support for gestures and manipulations.
